description: The Frank S. Wert Academic Scholarship is open to declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) majors who completed between 15-85 hours at the time of application. Students must have a minimum 3.0 cumulative GPA and be able to demonstrate financial need. Students must provide a personal statement outlining career goals and demonstrating financial need. Eligibility Requirements Declared Economics (Economics or Energy Economics) majors Completed between 15 - 85 HRS Minimum cumulative GPA of 3.0 or higher Personal statement that demonstrates financial need Personal statement outlining career goals

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
